dialog.text: Three horizontal layers (Top, mid, bot) Top is cloud, mid is mountain, bot is hill. On the hill, left one fourth is grass, right half is tree
Is there anything else in the clouds?
Top one tenth will be the sky, but the rest of top part will be cloud
Is there anything special about the mountain section?
Alright I added splotches of snow on the mountains. Did I get all the major details?
grass and trees are very clear to see at the bot section.
I cleared up some snow, is it clear enough now? Any other major details?
The mountains should try to be as clear as much, and the top part is lighter, the bot part will be darker
I tried to make the bot part darker, but it isn't getting much darker. Any other details?
I think it will be good, you have all the information
Alright is that it? Any other details I could add?
